name: @agent-trace/runtime
description: Strict in-memory runtime wiring for collector + api + projection.

scripts.build:deps: npm run --workspace @agent-trace/schema build && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/collector build && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/api build && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/cli build && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/platform build
scripts.typecheck:deps: npm run --workspace @agent-trace/schema build && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/collector build && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/api build && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/cli build && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/platform build
scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run clean && node ../../scripts/run-tsc.cjs -p tsconfig.json && node scripts/link-deps.cjs
